name: vs-seeker
effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads. Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
